snippet.title: First Oni Trailer (1998)
snippet.description:
This trailer appeared over 2 years before Oni's release.
Read more on it here: http://wiki.oni2.net/index.php/1998

Oni group: http://www.youtube.com/group/onitoo

This is rendered CG, not ingame action.
Some of the content (characters, animations) made it into the final game, but most didn't.

The soundtrack is "Trailer" by Power Of Seven. You can find it here: http://wiki.oni2.net/Music/CD#Trailer
